channel.title: addSkillxp - Runecrafting [PI]?
channel.description:
Has anyone found the method for adding skill exp to a specific stat? so far ive found "addSkillxp(,);" used in different stances, but when i try to use it i get..
[code]src\server\model\players\ActionHandler.java:1083: cannot find symbol symbol : method addSkillxp(int,int) location: class server.model.players.ActionHandler addSkillxp(2213,9); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: addSkillxp - Runecrafting [PI]?
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]The addSkillXP boolean is declared in the PlayerAssistant class.

Whenever we try to access something from the PlayerAssistant class, it’s best we construct the method with ‘c.getPA().’

Such as, c.getPA().addSkillXP(int, int);[/quote]

Thanks , your amazing .!

Read full topic
